summary: Fixed gameFlow integration tests to handle character selection phase
changes: Helper simulates all players selecting characters to reach 'play' phase
Added helper call to 6 test suites that need play phase
All 20 gameFlow integration tests now passing
rootCause: Tests were calling standardDraw() and other play-phase moves while still in characterSelection phase, causing 'ERROR: disallowed move'
solution: Helper function loops through players, selects character, calls endTurn() to advance, until phase transitions to 'play'
impact: CRITICAL - This fix unblocks 3 branches from merging to main
